column4: that might be cron for you trying to do some things it missed while the machine was off
Q1: What's cron? Q2 My problem (slow-running comp) happens after 4 or 5 hours of usage.
1) man cron, take a look in /etc/cron.daily/
2) it could still be cron, or some other problem.. run top when it happens and see who's using the cpu
